content: this is designed for a 23 goose statue like the one sold by miles kimball https //amzn to/3adrwsp my closet of goose outfits is growing and i would love for you to come enjoy them too https //snappy-tots com/goose/ 1 materials yarn 200 yards worsted weight yarn yarn used in the sample red heart super saver metallic black/gold crochet hook i 5 5mm supplies yarn needle for weaving in ends measuring tape scissors optional - tutu version 2 rolls of 6 x 12 yd glitter tulle in gold hair and dress bows - 2 5 yards 1 5 gold ribbon no wire measurements finished measurements measured flat 18 across bottom edge x 13 long gauge - 4 with an i hook = 14 half_double_crochet sts and 9 5 row/rounds _____________ email help is available with each pattern purchase please follow snappy tots on your favorites social media sites for giveaways new release announcements events and fun facebook 2 pinterest 3 instagram 4 twitter 5 please check out my other patterns ~ featured sale patterns of the week 6 ~ the rest of my shop for over 500 patterns shop now 7 join my facebook group totally snappy 8 for specials events sneak peeks and giveaways if you have any questions comments or suggestions please send me an email 9 _______________ copyright ©2024 snappy tots aka heidi yates no pattern may be reproduced or distributed in part or whole by any means without written permission graphics and pattern in part and whole may not be used for personal or profit finished products created from this pattern may be sold please include reference to snappy-tots com as pattern source when possible 1 https //snappy-tots com/goose/ 2 https //amzn to/3adrwsp 3 https //www pinterest com/snappytots/ 4 https //www instagram com/snappytots/ 5 https //twitter com/snappytots 6 http //www ravelry com/bundles/specials 7 http //shop snappy-tots com 8 https //www facebook com/groups/totallysnappy/ 9 mailto heidi@snappy-tots com
